WorkItem.Summary: The errors appeared when I try to build sources

Comments.Message: I have just downloaded and successfully build this solution, so the problem is probably not with D3. Are you sure you have .net 3.5 sp1 intalled?
I updated framework. All projects build correct. Thank you for quick assistance.
